    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Launch the program
        Parameters:
        args - You know what it is, Java.

      • startButton

        public void startButton(boolean st)
        Launch the machine. Don't stop before end. Can be stoped if :
        • ended = false : the program reached a final state
        • running = true : the program is stoped (but not ended)
        Parameters:
        st - True if the program must be run in Stop mode

        Do a single transition
